captions.text: Feels like yesterday when we were holding hands and laughs together
Why we had to end this way with more time it could've been okay
If we had more time, it would've been okay
I look out the window by myself because I know I can't turn it back
My heart is stopped at the memories we spent together
I'm suffering from longing for you, I cry out once again
I'm shattered out of the pain that I can't handle
Everyday is like hell Take this pain away I pray
Everything is over with that one word of good bye
As if I have a wound on my left chest
I feel like I can't breathe
Can you at least give me an excuse?
So that I can blame you
Of all the times, it's raining tonight
You're gone and I'm on this street alone
Doing things, and keeping myself busy
When time passes, would it get out of my mind?
Feels so cold and you're getting far away
Why does this have to end like this
Can you at least give me an excuse?
So that I can blame you
It's like my heart is bleeding from getting pricked by a thorn
Loneliness wraps me around like fog
I'm blind so day or night
I don't know what's going on
Tonight is so long I keep waiting
I say I won't hang on to it
that I will let it go
but uh just can't seem to let you go
Wherever whenever however I'm by your side
Can you at least give me an excuse?
So that I can blame you
Of all the times, it's raining tonight
You're gone and I'm on this street alone

comments.author: t lim

comments.text:
Back here because the Ark debuted and they are absolute amazing. 
Every.single.one. And they are all great at dancing omg....BoA is dancing 
queeeeen (no one beats her haha) but Minju gives off some super BoA-vibes, 
maybe because of the dance and the style of clothing she has, the male 
backup dancers, and her voice is sort of like hers in here + she kinda 
looks like her. But they are 2 different people, and I'm really loving the 
Ark. :D favorite rookie group this year so far. AND YUNA IS SO GOOD AT 
RAPPING...really impressed. :) not sure who of the 5 is my bias yet...but I 
have a few ideas :p they're all great. Need more subunits/solo songs 
because they all seem so talented.﻿
